law.catch_line: Compensation of board members and executive director.

text.section: Beginning January 1, 1998, each member of the board shall receive not more than one hundred dollars ($100) for each day actively engaged in the service of the board. During the period between July 15, 1996, and January 1, 1998, each board member shall receive not more than seventy-five dollars ($75) for each day actively engaged in the service of the board. Each member shall receive his traveling expenses and all necessary expenses incurred in the performance of his official duties.

The executive director of the board shall receive a reasonable salary determined by the board. He shall also receive his traveling expenses and all necessary expenses incurred in the performance of his official duties.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 260, sec. 5.
